style_property.title: Medal image in list
style_property.description: These are the styling rules for pages like help/medals, members/medals, etc.

style_property.title: Medal image in message
style_property.description: These are the styling rules for message user info block.

style_property.title: Medal image size in message
style_property.description: The size of the medal images. By default, there is only 2 sizes available: L (original) and T (tiny, 22px). You can render medium and small images by configure the options. Be sure to double check here if medals do not show up in messages.

style_property.title: Max medals
style_property.description: You can limit the maximum number of medals to display in messages here. If this property is set, only the latest X medals will show up.

style_property.title: Show date
style_property.description: Show the awarded date in tooltip for each medal.
